title: The development and implementation of a low-cost mechanical ventilator in a low-middle-income country during the COVID-19 pandemic: The Unisabana-HERONS
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Luis Fernando Giraldo-Cadavid, Julian Echeverry, Fabio Varón-Vega, Alirio Bastidas, Andrés Ramírez-Jaime, Andrés Felipe Cardona, Cristian Joao Lopez Vega, Cristian C. Serrano-Mayorca, Diana Garay, Diego Nicolás Rincón, Henry Oliveros, Iván Arturo Ramírez, Esteban Garcia-Gallo, Valeria A. Enciso-Prieto, Elsa D. Ibáñez-Prada, Juan Carlos Camelo, Laura Cucunubo, Lina Buitrago, Luis Alfredo Paipa, Luis Carlos Longas
